Description:
Perfectly Positioned!
Location location location! This block of land is in a prime position, right in the heart of Cockatoo with Commercial 1 zoning!
This fantastic, flat 611m2 (approx) block of land sits proudly at the top of Main Street.
Perfectly located within a stones throw to the new, future supermarket & providing an exciting opportunity to build new shops (STCA) this one is too good to miss!

Description:
"Lyric" - Welcome Home
The feeling you get from the moment you step into this property is that of entering an enchanted world. The home is steeped in history being an original cypress pine clad workers cottage with a 2 storey brick addition. Surrounded by mature gardens that ooze nonchalance belying the years of hard work that has gone into their creation.
As you wander around the house and pathways “outdoor rooms” are revealed where you can while away the hours with a book or do a bit of bird-spotting from the deck. The game of hide and seek can be taken to the next level in this garden. Planting includes at least 30 camellias, dogwoods, banksia roses, lilac, citrus, apple & plum trees. Plus a sunny veggie garden. One of the two carports doubles as a support for the glorious wisteria.
Before we enter the main home take a moment to think about how you will use the separate “tiny home” - it could be the best Wendy house ever or even an income producing Air B&B. One more outbuilding - and that is the work shed for all your tinkering & projects.
And finally, step through the impressive double front doors into the large and airy entrance hall. Ascend the staircase to find a large rumpus or library space with office and covered balcony. The master bedroom with its own balcony too, entered via the spacious walk through robe, ensuite with double shower and separate toilet.
Downstairs, three further bedrooms all with BIR’s and delightful views of the greenery outside. The main bathroom has a spa bath and double sinks. The kitchen looks out onto a large deck perfect for lunch and evening BBQ’s. The meals area opens into the family room with a bar area. There is a separate formal dining room with butlers pantry which would also work as a playroom or downstairs study. A central double sided wood-fired coonara is the hero here and links the family area with the more formal lounge with vaulted ceiling.
Not only is there a Harry Potter cupboard under the stairs but this home also has a cellar - accessed from a trapdoor in the hallway and also from outside. A cool store to keep all your bottles of wine, beer & pickles!
This is an incredibly lovely family home. Solidly built and with plenty of mod-cons including a multitude of power points throughout and on the decks. GDH & reversible fans. Town Water & Water Tanks.
Hurry to inspect your little bit of paradise.
Insights: 157 Rainy Hill Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2017 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
¼ ACRE WITH THE LOT
Set on a flat, sunny and usable ¼ acre (approx.) block with a young character family home in a quiet street this home is sure to please. Featuring two large living areas, front and rear deck and 4 bedrooms including a master with renovated full ensuite and walk in robe there is open plan kitchen that includes a dishwasher, a dining area and modern central bathroom. Outside features a low maintenance garden, fully fenced yard and a double garage. Special features include gas ducted heating, wood heater, evaporative cooling and plenty of room for cars, boats and trailers. Contact Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609 or Mat Fitch on 0473 363 606 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
"Auction"
"HIDDEN GEM ON 1/2 ACRE "
Tucked away behind the mature gardens you will find a hidden gem. Tastefully decorated, the vendors have transformed this home into a light filled modern retreat, yet still retaining some of that country charm which has been perfectly blended to give you the best of both worlds.
Features include:
: 3 bedrooms, master complete with walk in robe and Full ensuite
: Large living room with Gas log fire, vaulted ceilings and timber stacker doors leading out to the rear yard entertaining space.
: Near new kitchen and appliances, refurbished bathrooms, new carpet, paint and window furnishings.
: Circular drive way, plus side access to the double lock up garage with concrete floor and power.
: Ample space to park a truck, boat or caravan, Even space to build another shed.
: With a garden view from every room you will feel like you are in the garden of Eden.
: Walking distance to local shops and schools, and you have the perfect home.
Properties in this area are well sort out for, don't delay or you will miss out. Truly worthy of a inspection to appreciate what a special place this is, and it can be yours.

Description:
RELAX AND UNWIND IN THE RANGES
Looking for your own piece of heaven on 2.5 acres (approx)? With breathtaking views of the undulating surrounding country side, this peaceful 4 bedroom home will suit tree changers, families, or those just wanting to get away from the rat race.
Featuring a large renovated kitchen with stunning stone counter tops and island. There is plenty of cupboard and drawer space. You get 2 living areas with plenty of natural light.
Moving outside there is a timber decked pergola to take in the serene views whilst enjoying your favourite beverage. There is plenty of garaging/ shedding all accessible by a big driveway that makes manoeuvring trailers around on the property a breeze. All a short drive away from Emerald and Cockatoo villages.

Description:
A SOLID INVESTMENT
Situated just moments from the main hub of cockatoo is this solid brick veneer home, perfect for a first home, investment or downsizing. With 3 generous size rooms, neat and tidy kitchen/dining area, separate lounge, bathroom with bath and separate toilet this home could be the beginning of something amazing. Put your stamp on it with fenced rear yard, quiet location yet only walking distance to the bowls club, tennis courts, Alma Treloar reserve and the main street with public transport, schools and shops. This will be selling on Auction day so get ready – don’t miss out on this opportunity!! Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
Fantastic Modern Home with Pony Paddock!
What a perfect package! This lovely home has much on offer including 2 entrances, one for vehicles the other for the horse float or caravan and there’s even a pony paddock. The home has been beautifully updated and offers 4 bedrooms plus study. The spacious lounge is light filled and flows into the gorgeous kitchen which is decorated in classic colour scheme, complete with wood fired stove for turning out delicious baked goods for the family as well as keeping the whole house warm and toasty as it heats the hydronic panels as well as the hot water system, so cost effective for keeping the heating bills down. In summer you continue to save on the power bills as the hot water is heated using solar. From here you access the undercover entertaining deck with elevated outlook. Features of the home include the hydronic heating (the best heat around), timber and tiled floors, quality window furnishings and vaulted ceilings creating height. Outside there is everything you need including storage shed/workshop, wood shed, double carport and single carport for the horse float and the garden is pretty and low maintenance with a fox proof chicken run for happy safe girls. This much loved home needs to be on your to see list, you won’t be disappointed.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Contemporary Victorian Homestead With Unrivalled Views
The residence is positioned towards the rear of the property and accessed by a long driveway affording views along its entire length until it slowly appears into view, secluded amongst established gardens and shade trees, offering absolute privacy.
This is a contemporary Victorian weatherboard with all the embellishments of the era and with every up to the minute comfort, innovation and convenience.
There are broad return timber decked verandahs offering numerous vantage points from which to enjoy the panoramic views, with almost all rooms from the residence enjoying French door access to take full advantage of this wonderful amenity.
Constructed with best of materials and completed with a critical eye to detail, the residence has a feeling of solid dependability while imparting a truly calming energy. This is a home built for maximum enjoyment. The ability to segue sophistication with a casual ambience is a tightrope walk but the owners have managed to achieve that grand task – a real credit to them both.
With the classic grand proportions of each room, wide corridors, high ceilings, ornamental cornices, quality timber joinery, polished timber flooring, banks of timber framed windows, brick hearth and feature French doors and broad verandahs, right down to the authentic brick pattern of the chimney stack, this is a Victorian homestead of the landed gentry! The modern-day requirements of electric heating and cooling, solid fuel heating (to both formal and informal living areas), secret plumbing to wet areas, stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, oversized showers, Sok bath, modular wardrobes and full insulation makes this a very pleasant and comfortable home indeed.
Offering four bedrooms, all with those perfect views, the main bedroom with a luxurious ensuite bathroom, study/home office, Chef’s kitchen and informal dining, family bathroom, two grand living areas, formal entry and vestibule, outside powder room plus spacious laundry and walk in linen/ utility room. A broad timber decked outdoor living area overlooks neatly tended gardens planted sympathetically to the era, one area leading through a Wisteria covered archway to a full size (mod- grass) tennis court.
A timber Victorian style barn, concrete floored and powered offers both car accommodation and workshop space. With the classic front awning in place all that is missing is a hitching rail and horse trough! Adjacent is an original timber shed which has been renovated to two large stables with vertical hardwood lining boards. There is also a four bay steel machinery / hay shed of the modern era. Water security is assured with 100,000 litres of fresh water storage and two dams, one of which provides pumped pressure switch fed water to the gardens and stock troughs. The property comprises of 34 acres, offering an idyllic mix of gently sloping to moderately steep pastures and native hardwood bushland alive with flights of native birdlife who are regular visitors. There are seven paddocks for choice of livestock and good shelter for the greater comfort of stock. Conveniently located for access to both Melbourne and the delights of the Yarra Valley, the property affords a sophisticated yet casual rural lifestyle. Inspect with absolute confidence.
Insights: 40 Rainy Hill Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Tucked away down a tree lined driveway in the highly sort after hamlet of Cockatoo is this beautiful 4 acre property with wide open lawns dotted with ancient oak trees surrounded by towering eucalypts. The well-presented home delivers 4 spacious bedrooms all with built in wardrobes and are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet. Two separate living areas showcase the garden vistas and include a formal loungeroom with soaring timber ceilings and open fire place, while the open family room adjoins the wrap around kitchen and meals area. Outside an abundance of storage includes two 6 x 9m sheds perfect for a garage and machinery shed. Some additional fencing will make it perfect for a few animals or keep it as gardens and let the kids roam free. Either way this property is the perfect tree change opportunity.

Description:
HILLS LIVING WITH GARAGE AND REAR ACCESS
Situated in a quiet location not far from central Cockatoo is this character home ready for you and your family to move into. Freshly painted throughout the 3 bedroom home has been well maintained. Set on a usable ½ acre of land (approx.) with access to double garage from the rear lane making the perfect hobby shed while still keeping an eye on the children playing in the back yard. The large living area, spacious kitchen and separate dining in this home is a must see with bonus tree top views and the pleasant sounds of birds and puffing billy making it the perfect place to enjoy hills living. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
TIMELESS APPEAL WITH A BEAUTIFUL OUTLOOK
This charming home with timeless appeal is set on nearly 1 acre (3319m2) & is nestled on a park like setting at the peak of Paternoster Road offering some of the best valley and distant bay views the area has to offer. Surrounded by impressive manicured gardens & lush lawn areas, this character home features 3 bedrooms, high ceilings, polished hardwood floors, lounge with wood heater, timber kitchen with modern appliances and original wood stove. Outside you will discover a large well-appointed studio/bungalow complete with its own bathroom and toilet, a solar heated in-ground pool that is privately fenced off so you can entertain in complete solitude. Also on offer is a free range chicken pen, huge vegie patch, double tandem garage, and additional shedding that provides plenty of storage. The property also features bore water, town water, plus 58,000L of tank water, town gas & the bonus of sealed road access. Call today to make your hills dream a reality!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Character Home with 2 Road Access!
PLEASE USE ENTRANCE ON VINCENT ROAD.
If you need space for the caravan, trailer, boat, heavy equipment etc. this is the perfect property for you. Conveniently located and situated on ½ an acre, the property has 2 street accesses; there is even enough room for a pony with a cleared fenced paddock. The home has original features and retains its yesteryear charm with 2 bedrooms, lounge room with wood heater and split system, great sized kitchen, family bathroom and lovely undercover deck with elevated outlook. The home has recently had a lot of upgrades, including painting inside and out and in the garden a lot of work has been done on retaining walls and tiered garden beds for a cottage garden style and which makes working in the garden a breeze. For vehicles there are 2 entrances on the Vincent Street side, double carport and studio/workshop, you then you have the Viewhill access with lock up garage and paddock. The home is also connected to all services with underground power & phone so you don’t have to look at unattractive power lines. This charming property will appeal to many buyers and is perfectly priced for first home owners and young families so be quick to book your inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Sit back and relax
Looking for your own piece of heaven on 2.5 acres (approx)? With breathtaking views of the undulating surrounding country side, this peaceful 4 bedroom home will suit tree changers, families, or those just wanting to get away from the rat race.
Featuring a large renovated kitchen with stunning stone counter tops and island. There is plenty of cupboard and drawer space. You get 2 living areas with plenty of natural light.
Moving outside there is a timber decked pergola to take in the serene views whilst enjoying your favourite beverage. There is plenty of garaging/ shedding all accessible by a big driveway that makes maneuvering trailers around on the proper ty a breeze. All a short drive away from Emerald and Cockatoo villages.

Description:
WHAT A RIPPER
This three bedroom brick home, main bedroom with full ensuite has plenty to get excited about. The sealed driveway leads to an enclosed double carport with access to extra car or storage space, ideal for a tradie. This area could easily be converted to another bedroom or living space. The main lounge features open fire place, vaulted ceiling, brick feature wall with earthy coloured tiles, a great place to relax and unwind. Packed with plenty of features buyers are looking for such as separate dining area, ducted heating, Coonara wood heater and a flexible floorplan. The fenced rear yard makes it safe for pets and children to play and with a separate veggie garden, chook, storage shed means you’ll have to be quick for this one.
Inspect at the open or BY APPOINTMENT
Contact the agent Jim Conder 0408 597 558 for details.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
SPACE TO ENJOY, SURROUNDED BY PEACE & TRANQUILITY ON OVER ¾ OF AN ACRE!
Making the move to the hills has never been easier when you get to experience this country lifestyle everyday! Set on over ¾ of an acre, this beautifully presented log cabin home enjoys a lovely outlook that will make you feel the connection to the greenery outdoors from every angle. Inside the home offers high ceilings, modern colour schemes & earthy timber features that create a relaxing environment for you to enjoy with your family & friends. Choose to dine in the sun room or relax in the living area with wood heater and split system heating/cooling or take time to tune into nature on the veranda listening to the kookaburras and watching king parrots. There are 4 bedrooms plus separate study to accommodate a growing family or give you the space to spread out and have friends and family come to stay. The home has a good size carport/workshop/storage under the house as well as loads of Off-Street parking for plenty more cars. There is also a large shed with wood heater and bar, as well as a paved outside BBQ area with a lovely water feature, great for entertaining. For the children and animals there is lots of yard to play or for the explorers in the family there is a gully full of Fern trees, native trees and shrubs to create a secret garden which is separately fenced off from a lush green grassed area. The position of this property couldn't be better; in a court, only minutes from shops, schools and public transport. Inspect today!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Private Retreat on 1 Acre!
If you’re looking for you own private haven, somewhere safe to bring the kids up in a happy, healthy environment then look no further. Located in a quiet street close to all the amenities Cockatoo has to offer including school, shops, cafes, transport and bulk billing Doctor. The much loved home has been updated with style and offers plenty of fun for the kids with a sand pit, pool, cute cubby house, there is even a pony paddock and holding yard for 4 legged friends. The split level home consist of 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the Master with walk in robe and parents retreat, gorgeous country style kitchen with granite bench tops, rustic timber features and huge walk in pantry. Adjacent to here is the dining area and family room with toasty wood heater and access to the entertaining deck running the length of the home with tranquil outlook of the garden and trees. Features include gas ducted heating, beautiful timber floors, painted timber panelling for that country look, vaulted ceilings which have been painted for light, claw foot bath in the bathroom and a handy powder room. The established garden is well maintained with feature trees and gently sloping lawns and will provide you with years of enjoyment. This lovely property is well worth an inspection, those who do will not want to leave.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Warm, Hills Home on a ¼ Acre Block!
AUCTION
This typically built Hills home has a warm feeling with the feature timber panelling and the pitched ceilings giving it a sense of space and height. Located in a convenient position, close to the hills town of Cockatoo and all this thriving town has to offer, including school, bulk billing local doctor and public transport, the home sits elevated on a quite flat ¼ acre block offering a peaceful treed outlook from the front deck, perfect for sitting quietly with your morning coffee and listening to the local birdlife. The home offers 3 bedrooms, open plan living with spacious lounge, meals and galley kitchen with ample storage and views to the rear yard. Features include the lovely timber lining boards, near new carpets throughout, gas heating and undercover decks running the length of the front and rear of the home. For those who like to tinker there is a handy workshop under the house which has been bricked in and has concrete floor and 3 phase power; there is also extra storage space available under the home. Outside you have tank water for the garden and all services are connected making life very easy indeed. The property is being Auctioned so be sure to have your finance secured so you have a strong chance of being the successful bidder on the day.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Total Perfection On ½ An Acre!
This stunning family home is perfectly positioned in one of Cockatoos most sought after locations & is sure to impress even the most discerning buyer. From the moment you step inside you will be delighted with the quality that is on offer with features that include a stunning modern kitchen with granite benches, glass splash backs & stainless steel appliances including 900mm stove and dishwasher and a large light filled open plan family living room with atmospheric wood fire and fold back café doors merging the indoors with the outdoors. There are 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 that include built in robes and the master that is serviced by a full ensuite & WIR whilst a modern bathroom complete with relaxing deep bath caters to the family’s needs. Special features include evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, quality carpets throughout and a fresh modern colour scheme. Step outside & discover a useable 1/2 an acre that features stunning landscaped gardens, sweeping wrap around verandahs, garden shed, sealed drive, chicken coup, double carport & plenty of parking. Call today before it’s too late.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
SUPURB STYLE ON 1/4 ACRE!
Offering unsurpassed quality and style, this magnificent home has been lovingly renovated and beautifully maintained making it perfect for those who appreciate quality and style. Perfectly positioned on a manicured 1/4 acre allotment, the home offers 3 spacious bedrooms, modern bathroom and an open plan central lounge and dining that adjoins the stunning Caesarstone kitchen which comes complete with top of the range stainless steel appliances including a 900mm cooker and an Asko dishwasher. Other features include gas heating, split system heating and cooling, quality carpets and a fresh modern colour scheme throughout. Outside offers established gardens including a raised veggie plot, large covered decked entertaining area which is the ideal place to sit back and entertain friends and family, plenty of parking, fully fenced yard and a colorbond garage with workshop and carport both complete with concrete floor and power. Call today, an inspection will delight!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Private Cottage On Almost 1 Acre With A Creek
Perfectly located down a quiet country lane and like something out of the pages of a children’s storybook, this character filled log cabin sits beautifully amongst a secluded setting that features a canopy of leafy established trees and offers a wonderful atmosphere for relaxed living. Spend your leisure time making the most of the meandering creek that winds its way through the property, many happy hours can be spent with family and friends taking in the sights and sounds of nature. The home has loads of charm with shady verandah to sit back on and a decked area for outdoor entertaining. Inside offers 2 spacious bedrooms, large bathroom and picture windows that frame a garden view from every angle. Open plan living area features cosy wood fire, high ceilings, chunky timbers and split system heating/cooling to ensure year round comfort. The streamlined timber kitchen has plenty of cupboards, dishwasher, hotplates and wall oven. A perfect place for quiet contemplation, the property would also allow the creative juices to flow for an artist or writer or for those wanting a self-sufficient lifestyle there is plenty of space to grow. A double garage with concrete floor, power and remote access completes a picture perfect package.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
